industry_definition: The Dialysis Centers industry includes medical facilities that provide inpatient and outpatient kidney or renal dialysis services.

opportunities: Federal funding for Medicare and Medicaid

key_trends: The essential nature of dialysis underscores demand...
Government insurance providers create stable coverage for dialysis...
Certification from public healthcare programs is tantamount for success...
Care quality is the hallmark of kidney dialysis centers...
Dialysis centers compete with hospitals providing similar services...
Profitability across dialysis centers is high...
